qualitative_findings.finding: QA launcher provides deterministic scenario order, but execution still depends on manual operator walkthrough.
qualitative_findings.impact: Weekly UX rounds can drift in rigor unless run artifacts are captured consistently.
qualitative_findings.recommendation: Capture scenario outcome rows (VQA-01..VQA-06) in a per-run report and require pass/fail notes per scenario.

qualitative_findings.finding: Client build warns about a large JS chunk (~1.1MB minified).
qualitative_findings.impact: Large bundles increase first-load latency and can degrade first-run UX confidence.
qualitative_findings.recommendation: Schedule chunk-splitting/perf follow-up before M8 demo-readiness gate.

qualitative_findings.finding: Likert-based perceived-control/approval-confidence metrics are not derivable from fixtures alone.
qualitative_findings.impact: Cohort-level trust metrics remain unknown until moderated sessions are run.
qualitative_findings.recommendation: Run human cohort rounds per docs/ux-outcome-metrics-and-research-protocol.md and store anonymized scores in report JSON.
